coordinates.name: Nazar'yevo
coordinates.poster: Long live Red Army of workers and peasants - the true guard of the Soviet borders!

coordinates.name: Navoloki
coordinates.poster: On each and every attack our valorous Red Army will answer with three times more powerful blows!

coordinates.name: Navlya
coordinates.poster: Be a pilot, contribute to the power of the Air Force!

coordinates.name: Navashino
coordinates.poster: Long live powerful aviation of the socialist country!

coordinates.name: Naurskaya
coordinates.poster: If the war comes tomorrow...

coordinates.name: Alpatovo
coordinates.poster: Komsomol member, be ready to protect USSR, learn how to shoot accurately!

coordinates.name: Natyrbovo
coordinates.poster: From People's Commissar (Timoshenko) personal record

coordinates.name: Naryshkino
coordinates.poster: Cut the enemy! (1939).

coordinates.name: Nar'yan-Mar
coordinates.poster: Red Army is the loyal guard of the October Revolution's gains.

coordinates.name: Nartkala
coordinates.poster: Compulsory military education strengthens our defense!

coordinates.name: Nartan
coordinates.poster: Our cause is just, enemy will be crushed

coordinates.name: Narovchat
coordinates.poster: For the Motherland, Honor and Freedom!

coordinates.name: Naro-Fominsk
coordinates.poster: Russian people will never fall to its knees

coordinates.name: Narimanov
coordinates.poster: In the sky, on the ground and in the sea.

coordinates.name: Nal’chik
coordinates.poster: I swear to defeat the enemy.

coordinates.name: Nakhabino
coordinates.poster: Let's crush the enemy under avalanch of steel

coordinates.name: Nagutskoye
coordinates.poster: Death to the Fashism

coordinates.name: Nagorsk
coordinates.poster: Glory to the heroes of the Patriotic War! Glory to the Stalin's falcons!

coordinates.name: Lakha Nëvre
coordinates.poster: Soldiers of all nationalities, fight for Motherland and victory!

coordinates.name: Nadvoitsy
coordinates.poster: Be a hero!

coordinates.name: Nadezhda
coordinates.poster: Fight German animals! We can and must destroy Hitler's army.

coordinates.name: Nachalovo
coordinates.poster: Death to the Fashist-German invaders

coordinates.name: Naberezhnyye Chelny
coordinates.poster: When anti-tank gunner stands on the way, fashist tank will not pass!

coordinates.name: Myurego
coordinates.poster: The face of Hitlerism

coordinates.name: Mytishchi
coordinates.poster: Red Army's broom will sweep the enemy out!

coordinates.name: Myshkin
coordinates.poster: Glory to the Red Army!

coordinates.name: Myatlevo
coordinates.poster: Long live the gunners of the Red Army!

coordinates.name: Myaksa
coordinates.poster: Nothing will stop us! We are Russians, we will overcome! (A.Suvorov)

coordinates.name: Muyezerskiy
coordinates.poster: Let's use all might of our weaponry against impudent enemy.

coordinates.name: Mutsalaul
coordinates.poster: Spade is a soldier's friend!

coordinates.name: Muslyumovo
coordinates.poster: Job well done!

coordinates.name: Murygino
coordinates.poster: Fight like this: every bullet means an enemy killed

coordinates.name: Murom
coordinates.poster: Put every bullet into the German

coordinates.name: Murmino
coordinates.poster: Fight like this: put every shell into the German tank

coordinates.name: Murmashi
coordinates.poster: Our new victories will glorify our banners!

coordinates.name: Murmansk
coordinates.poster: Motherland is calling you!

coordinates.name: Murino
coordinates.poster: For the Motherland!

coordinates.name: Murashi
coordinates.poster: Beat them hard, my son!

coordinates.name: Muranovo
coordinates.poster: Our cause is just, victory will be ours!

coordinates.name: Mumra
coordinates.poster: For defense of the Motherland

coordinates.name: Mullovka
coordinates.poster: Join people's home guard!

coordinates.name: Mulino
coordinates.poster: Young people, fight for the Motherland!

coordinates.name: Mukhtolovo
coordinates.poster: A commissar is a father and soul of his unit.

coordinates.name: Mugi
coordinates.poster: Under Lenin's banner, let's go forward for the Motherland, for our victory!

coordinates.name: Muchkapskiy
coordinates.poster: Stalin is a greatness of our time! Stalin is a banner of our victories!

coordinates.name: Mtsensk
coordinates.poster: Under Lenin's banner, forward to victory!

coordinates.name: Mstikhino
coordinates.poster: "Spirit of the great Lenin and his victorios banner inspire us to fight Patriotic War." (Stalin)

coordinates.name: Mstera
coordinates.poster: Let's go forward, destroy German invaiders and throw them out from our Motherland!

coordinates.name: Mrakovo
coordinates.poster: Communists and Komsomol members, be in the first line of the fighters against German-Fashist bloody dogs

coordinates.name: Moscow
coordinates.poster: Komsomol member, be a Hero of the Great Patriotic War
